system.note: Xenotech. Causes fear and pain rather than direct damage. Anyone in 5 metres of shot location tests Fear(2), considering source of fear to be origin point of shot.

description.value:
Special: Blast (5)

Note: Xenotech. Causes fear and pain rather than direct damage. Anyone in 5 metres of shot location tests Fear(2), considering source of fear to be origin point of shot.
